text: Nora Brockstedt (20 January 1923 - 5 November 2015) was a Norwegian singer. She was born in Oslo. Brockstedt represented Norway in the Eurovision Song Contest 1960 and 1961, with the memorable songs "Voi-voi" and ["summer in Palma"] "Sommer i Palma". Brockstedt died in hospital in Oslo from a long illness, aged 92. ==References== ==Other websites== * Short recording of Nora Brockstedt singing Category:1923 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Disease- related deaths in Norway Category:Eurovision Song Contest entrants Category:Musicians from Oslo Category:Norwegian singers
title: Nora Brockstedt
